if there is DIV inside PRE, on content copy you loose extra space and tabs
because of this we are loosing formatting at https://gist.github.com/888867

Steps:-
1. go to attachment lose_space.html
2. select all the text
3. copy text using ctrl + c
4. open notepad.exe 
5. paste text

Result:-
under case 1 the displayed extra space around "extra spaces" and "delimited tab" gone.

Expected:-
copy and paste should preserve space.


PS: we code preserve space if the selection is completely inside the <DIV>
comments.author: BijuMailList@GMail.Com
